 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּקַח‎</span> **verb** ==open eyes and== (once) ==ears== (Late Hebrew ***id., open*** (and remove) rubbish heap, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***look to, attend to***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***blossom***, II. ***open eyes***; Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּקַח‎</span> ***open*** eyes, etc.; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***blossom***; — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Job.27.19|Job 27:19]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּקַחְתָּ‎</span> [[Job.14.3|Job 14:3]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְקַח‎</span> [[Gen.21.19|Gen 21:19]] +; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפְקַח‎</span> [[Zech.12.4|Zech 12:4]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּקַח‎</span> [[2Kgs.6.17|2Kgs 6:17]] +, so [[Dan.9.18|Dan 9:18]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פקחה‎</span>); ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּקוֺחַ‎</span> [[Isa.42.20|Isa 42:20]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְקֹחַ‎</span> v[[Isa.42.7|Isa 42:7]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּקֵחַ‎</span> [[Ps.146.8|Ps 146:8]] ***passive*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּקֻחוֺת‎</span> [[Jer.32.19|Jer 32:19]] — 

**1.** ***open*** eyes: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** one's own [[2Kgs.4.35|2Kgs 4:35]]; [[Job.27.19|Job 27:19]]; [[Prov.20.13|Prov 20:13]]; [[2Kgs.19.16|2Kgs 19:16]] = [[Isa.37.17|Isa 37:17]]; [[Dan.9.18|Dan 9:18]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Jer.32.19|Jer 32:19]]; [[Zech.12.4|Zech 12:4]]; [[Job.14.3|Job 14:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** eyes of others [[Gen.21.19|Gen 21:19]]; [[2Kgs.6.17|2Kgs 6:17]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.6.20|2Kgs 6:20]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.42.7|Isa 42:7]]; [[Ps.146.8|Ps 146:8]] — for details see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיִן‎</span> 

**1 j. 2.** ***open*** ears = hear [[Isa.42.20|Isa 42:20]] (without understanding; figurative of Israel). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִפְקְחוּ‎</span> [[Gen.3.5|Gen 3:5]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפָּקַחְנָה‎</span> [[Isa.35.5|Isa 35:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתּ‎</span> [[Gen.3.7|Gen 3:7]] — ***be opened***, of eyes; figurative, so as to know good and evil [[Gen.3.5|Gen 3:5]]; [[Gen.3.7|Gen 3:7]] opposed to blindness (figurative) [[Isa.35.5|Isa 35:5]].
